StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetChildOrgsAssets]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ParentOrgID int AS
SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID, SHORT_NAME, ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @ParentOrgID AND --- retrieve Open organiza.ons ISOPEN = 'Y' ORDER BY SHORT_NAME
